main_definition: Coordination refers to the organized arrangement or management of different elements, activities, or individuals to work together efficiently towards a common goal.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The ability to use various parts of the body together smoothly and efficiently
meanings_and_examples.example: She has excellent coordination skills which help her excel in sports like basketball.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The process or skill involved in ensuring different elements, tasks, or groups work well together
meanings_and_examples.example: Good coordination among team members was crucial for the project's success.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A system or organization designed to manage and control activities effectively
meanings_and_examples.example: The company established a new coordination department to oversee all its operations efficiently.
